```{r}
library(tidyverse)

#released reasons for each race, take the percentage of each race in each major category
#election days,

library(tidyverse)
ccso = read.csv("CCSO Data.csv")
#released reasons for each race, take the percentage of each race in each major category

View(ccso)
attach(ccso)
conversion = vars(Days.in.Jail,Hours,Minutes)
to_num = function(x) {
  as.numeric(as.character(x))
}

#total days spent in jail
ccso1 = ccso %>% 
  select(-c(BOOKING.NUMBER,JACKET.NUMBER,JACKET.TYPE,MILITARY,STATUTE.TYPE,CHARGE.STATUTE)) %>%
  mutate(total_days = to_num(Days.in.Jail) + to_num(Hours)/24 + to_num(Minutes)/1440) %>%
  group_by(RACE) %>%
  summarise(avg = mean(total_days,na.rm = T))
View(ccso1)
#this is for the same crime across race, View(ccso2) and use command f
ccso2 = ccso %>% 
        select(-c(BOOKING.NUMBER,JACKET.NUMBER,JACKET.TYPE,MILITARY,STATUTE.TYPE,CHARGE.STATUTE)) %>%
        subset(RACE != "" & RACE != "Unknown") %>%
        mutate(total_days = to_num(Days.in.Jail) + to_num(Hours)/24 + to_num(Minutes)/1440) %>%
        group_by(RACE,CRIME.CODE) %>%
        summarise(avg = round(mean(total_days,na.rm = T),digits = 4)) # a min is .0007 days
        
levels(RACE)
class(ccso2)
View(ccso2)
View(ccso1)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
ui <- fluidPage(
  
  # App title ----
  titlePanel("Champaign County Jail (2011-2016)"),
  
  # Sidebar layout with input and output definitions ----
  sidebarLayout(
    
    # Sidebar panel for inputs ----
    sidebarPanel(
      
      # Input: Select a file ----
      fileInput("CCSO", "Choose CSV File",
                multiple = TRUE,
                accept = c("text/csv",
                           "text/comma-separated-values,text/plain",
                           ".csv")),
      
      # Horizontal line ----
      tags$hr(),
      
      # Input: Checkbox if file has header ----
      checkboxInput("header", "Header", TRUE),
      
      # Input: Select separator ----
      radioButtons("sep", "Separator",
                   choices = c(Comma = ",",
                               Semicolon = ";",
                               Tab = "\t"),
                   selected = ","),
      
      # Input: Select quotes ----
      radioButtons("quote", "Quote",
                   choices = c(None = "",
                               "Double Quote" = '"',
                               "Single Quote" = "'"),
                   selected = '"'),
      
      # Horizontal line ----
      tags$hr(),
      
      # Input: Select number of rows to display ----
      radioButtons("disp", "Display",
                   choices = c(Head = "head",
                               All = "all"),
                   selected = "head")
      
    ),
    
    # Main panel for displaying outputs ----
    mainPanel(
      
      # Output: Data file ----
      tableOutput("contents")
      
    )
    
  )
)

# Define server logic to read selected file ----
server <- function(input, output) {
  
  output$contents <- renderTable({
    
    # input$file1 will be NULL initially. After the user selects
    # and uploads a file, head of that data file by default,
    # or all rows if selected, will be shown.
    
    req(input$CCSO)
    
    df <- read.csv(input$CCSO$datapath,
                   header = input$header,
                   sep = input$sep,
                   quote = input$quote)
    
    if(input$disp == "head") {
      return(head(df))
    }
    else {
      return(df)
    }
    
  })
  options(shiny.maxRequestSize=30*1024^2)
  
  
}
# Run the app ----
shinyApp(ui, server)
```
